20101211011204.333|20101211011207.667|CCO|SKEPTICS LIKE THIS MAN.
20101211011207.667|20101211011211.000|CCO|HE IS NOT CONVINCED.
20101211011211.000|20101211011213.500|CCO|>> THE PROBLEM MOST PEOPLE HAVE
20101211011213.500|20101211011216.000|CCO|IS NOT THE AMOUNT OF WATER IN
20101211011216.000|20101211011218.500|CCO|THE LAST 30 YEARS.
